name: Sitting Room
description: a portrait of a finely dressed sow smiling to her right, titled Tre Amore

name: Lounge
description: a watercolor of three piglets in a field, titled The Trilling

name: Hall
description: a dire portrait of a pig in emperor's attire facing the right, titled En Tyrant

name: Gallery
description: a watercolor of a pair of smiling pigs in fine gothic suits staring right, titled Tvillinger

name: Greenhouse
description: a statue of a two pigs in a tight embrace, titled Elskere

name: Study
description: a clay pot with the mural of a pig leaping right over another clay pot, titled Par Boil

name: Kitchen
description: an ominous picture of a demonic pig staring straight down, titled The Harbinger

name: Dining Room
description: a grotesque mural of a pig in full armor standing atop a pile of corpses, titled The Conquerer
